title: Offline Ray Tracer
shortDescription: Physically based CPU renderer built with C++20. Implements Monte Carlo path tracing and BVH acceleration.

details.overview: This project explores the fundamentals of physically based rendering. I implemented a path tracer from scratch to understand light transport, material properties, and sampling strategies.
contributions: Implemented Monte Carlo Path Tracing integration.
Built a BVH (Bounding Volume Hierarchy) for accelerated ray intersection.
Supported varying material types including Lambertian, Metal, and Dielectrics.

longFormContent.content: The core of the renderer is based on the rendering equation. I utilized C++20 features to ensure the codebase was modern and efficient. The use of the GLM library handled the linear algebra requirements.
